result.title: Data Management Plan – Mid-term Update
result.description: The Data Management Plan is a living document that should evolve during the course of the project. At the moment, only one version of the DMP is foreseen in the GA (D11.4). Two additional releases are envisaged that should improve the initial version delivered in Month 6. In the mid-term version of the deliverable in M18 (with the scope of the demonstrations closed), we will add the detail of the data that will be used in all the demonstrators and describe the role of each partner in the management of the data. In the final version in M54 (a couple of months later than the end of demos) we will report the actual data that has been used in all the demonstrations.

result.title: Improved concept of Energy Infrastructures at district-city level in Dresden - Final Version
result.description: Subtasks 3.4.1 and 3.4.2 Dresden will define its innovative approach to energy infrastructures in Johannestadt district. The new approach will involve smart grids, district heating and district cooling with a focus on improving the performance and monitoring at district level.
